title: The Bodyguard (1992) Kevin Costner ( Optional MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0103855/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0103855/</a>
a.k.a.: Bodyguard, the - Bodyguard - The Bodyguard

With Whitney Houston

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files (Work in Windows Media Player etc.): Danish, Dutch, English for the hearing impaired, English (normal), Finnish, French, German, Hebrew, Italian, Norwegian, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish.

Kevin Costner guards Whitney Houston both in and out of bed. Classic tribute to Whitney at the top of her career, including "I will always love you". Complete soundtrack list at <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/gp/recsradio/radio/B000002VMD/ref=pd_krex_listen_dp_img?ie=UTF8&refTagSuffix=dp_img" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/gp/recsradio/radio/B000002VMD/ref=pd_krex_listen_dp_img?ie=UTF8&refTagSuffix=dp_img</a>

I thought this classic should be available in a small rip with optional multisubs, so I made one for you.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x368, great stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
